snippet: Jill and Wayne Spencer of Indio, Calif., worked as line judges in more than 70 matches at the United States Open over more than two weeks, but when the finals came along this weekend, they watched from the hospital.
abstract: Jill and Wayne Spencer of Indio, Calif., worked as line judges in more than 70 matches at the United States Open over more than two weeks, but when the finals came along this weekend, they watched from the hospital.

headline.main: For Two U.S. Open Umpires, a Difficult Trip Home
